tool_description: Evaluates zoning regulations against property characteristics and uses to determine specific compliance requirements and identify applicable restrictions.

building_area.description: Total building area in square feet

error_messages: Zoning code not found: The specified zoning designation is not valid for this jurisdiction.
Use not defined: The property use is not recognized in the zoning classification system.
Insufficient property data: Building area and property size must be greater than zero.
Jurisdiction rules unavailable: Compliance rules are not available for the specified jurisdiction.
usage: Input zoning designation, property use, and physical characteristics to generate applicable compliance requirements. This tool establishes the regulatory framework for violation detection.

use_permitted.description: Whether the use is permitted in this zone

applicable_restrictions.description: List of restrictions that apply to this property

required_setbacks.description: Required setback distances by property side
